Package outputjunit.files

Class FileDirectoryCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • outputjunit.files.FileDirectoryCreator
  • public class FileDirectoryCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static methods to create the directory for the test files.
    Author:
    dschoenicke

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG
      The Logger to be used in the methods

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FileDirectoryCreator()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void createFileDirectories​(JunitRepresentation junitRepresentation, java.lang.String outputPath)
      Static method to create the directories for the test files of the given JunitRepresentation.
      Hereby, a directory for each package is created, which will contain its sub packages and test files.
      Creates the tests in a directory called [representation name]Structure, overwrites the directory, if it already exists.
      (package private) static void createFileDirectory​(JunitRepresentation junitRepresentation, JunitParent junitParent, java.lang.String testFilePath)
      Static method to create a directory for a given JunitPackage.
      This method ignores all packages, which qualified name doesn't start with the name of the JunitRepresentation to exclude tests of external classes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public FileDirectoryCreator()

    • Method Detail

      • createFileDirectories

        public static void createFileDirectories​(JunitRepresentation junitRepresentation,
                                         java.lang.String outputPath)
        Static method to create the directories for the test files of the given JunitRepresentation.
        Hereby, a directory for each package is created, which will contain its sub packages and test files.
        Creates the tests in a directory called [representation name]Structure, overwrites the directory, if it already exists.
        Parameters:
        junitRepresentation - the JunitRepresentation containing the JunitPackages to create the directory for.
        outputPath - the file path where the directories should be created.

      • createFileDirectory

        static void createFileDirectory​(JunitRepresentation junitRepresentation,
                                JunitParent junitParent,
                                java.lang.String testFilePath)
        Static method to create a directory for a given JunitPackage.
        This method ignores all packages, which qualified name doesn't start with the name of the JunitRepresentation to exclude tests of external classes.
        Parameters:
        junitRepresentation - the JunitRepresentation to check whether the given JunitPackage is a package of the application under test.
        junitParent - the JunitParent to create the directory for and which JunitPackages the directories should be created.
        testFilePath - the path of the root directory.
